name: eQTL Analysis
body:
This website contains the materials for an introductory 
eQTL analysis course. The main focus is on the use of
linear models for the detection of associations between
SNPs and gene expression. 

The material contains several exercises that use R for
various data manipulation and analysis tasks. Basic
familiarity with this language will therefore be helpful.

## Slides and Exercises
The slides for the course are available [here](slides/eqtl_analysis.html). A number of related
[exercises](exercises/exercises.html) and suggested [solution](exercises/exercises_and_solutions.html)
are also available.

## Docker image
A docker image containing all software required to carry out
the exercises as well as most of the required data is available from
[DockerHub](https://registry.hub.docker.com/u/humburg/eqtl-intro/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
